New_Haven.Sound School:
The Sound School is a regional vocational aquaculture center situated in the City Point neighborhood of New Haven, Connecticut.
The Sound School Regional Vocational Aquaculture Center is an accredited inter-district college preparatory high school, one of the 19 vocational agriculture centers in Connecticut, and a part of the New Haven Public Schools system. It is the first full-time center to concentrate in the study of aquaculture and marine trades.
